title: Keen 1 mod
content:

title: Re: ooh
content:
Two things I suggest you focus on that are often overlooked are:

Interesting story
Take care with the storyline, but keep it simple and include elements of Keenish humour. Don't make it too deep and dark, but don't let it become too mindless and lighthearted either. Sprinkle sarcasm and puns with care, and remember Keen's cocky attitude.

As says Xky, something with a Vorticon protagonist would be great. I look forward to what you come up with in this area.

Scenery

A major downfall of many mods (including my own beta of Monky Business) is that the items are often the only form of decoration, and once they're gone there's nothing there to make the level feel alive and thus the game feels barren and uninteresting. Make the place feel like it has a purpose besides obstructing the player from his/her goal.

Try to make things modular, so that you don't just end up with a chunk of tiles that always appear in the same order.
